title: Finserv Customer Management overview
content_markdown:
Version: 8.3Creatio Financial Services CRM
On this page
Use the **Finserv Customer Management** app to get a unified view of your customer’s financial profile, including essential data and analytical insights. The app is designed for financial institutions that need comprehensive visibility into customer financial status, documentation, and compliance evaluations. You can customize the **Finserv Customer Management** app similar to any Freedom UI app to make sure it fits your business goals as closely as possible.
The Finserv Customer Management app extends the functionality of the **Customer 360** app in Creatio Financial Services CRM. Learn more: [Customer 360 overview](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2473).
## Enhanced contact page​
View deeper financial insights on additional elements and AI-driven analytics on the enhanced contact page. The following enhancements help you understand the customer better:
* Review AI-generated analytical outputs and explore detailed performance metrics in the **Overview** tab.
* Inspect essential customer identity fields used in banking and financial services, along with all related files and recorded consents, in the **Contact info** tab.
* Assess calculated indicators supporting risk assessment and compliance, and examine results from completed checks such as KYC and other regulatory evaluations, in the **Compliance & Risk Monitoring** tab.
* Analyze income, expenses, assets, and liabilities for the contact in the **Financial summary** tab.
Fig. 1 Enhanced contact page
![Fig. 1 Enhanced contact page](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/finserv-customer-management-overview/scr_contact_page.png)
## Document properties​
Customize document properties to enhance organization and retrieval. Tag, classify, and filter financial documentation according to your internal policies and compliance standards.
Fig. 2 Document properties
![Fig. 2 Document properties](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/finserv-customer-management-overview/scr_document_properties.png)
## Evaluations​
Manage evaluations, such as KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML checks, directly within the Customer 360 workspace. Evaluation results are clearly presented, ensuring regulatory compliance and simplifying audit trails. Learn more: [Create an evaluation](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2590).
Fig. 3 Evaluation
![Fig. 3 Evaluation](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/finserv-customer-management-overview/scr_evaluation.png)
## Advanced customization​
You can customize the app to further meet your goals by customizing the following objects:
AI insights and alerts| Stores AI insights and alerts powered by user-created prompts. Creatio displays five most recent insights and alerts related to the contact on the **Overview** tab of the contact page. Learn more about creating prompts: [Develop Creatio.ai Skill](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2535).  
---|---  
Contact income| Stores contact income data populated via integration or custom logic.  
Contact expenses| Stores contact expense data populated via integration or custom logic.  
Contact liabilities| Stores contact liabilities data populated via integration or custom logic.  
Contact assets| Stores contact assets data populated via integration or custom logic.  
Evaluation history| Stores results of compliance checks including but not limited to KYC and AML. Supports manual input or integration-based updates. Additionally, the "Contact" object was extended to store the resulting verification status.  
Learn more: [Manage app elements in the No-Code Designer](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2418).
* * *
## See also​
[Enhancements by other Creatio apps](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2587)
[Manage document properties](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2588)
[Set up document properties](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2589)
[Create an evaluation](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2590)
[Set up evaluation process](http://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2591)
